Visit Our Lab

Campus Location

PKUX LAB is located on the beautiful Peking University campus in Beijing. We're housed in the Science Building 3, Floor 32.

Getting Here

  • By Subway: Line 4 to Peking University East Gate Station
  • By Bus: Multiple bus routes serve the PKU area
  • By Car: Visitor parking available on campus
  • International: 45 minutes from Beijing Capital Airport

Campus Visits

We welcome visitors and offer lab tours by appointment. Please contact us at least one week in advance to schedule a visit.

Campus Map

üìç Interactive campus map available at:
maps.pku.edu.cn

Get Involved

Research Collaboration

We actively collaborate with industry partners, academic institutions, and research organizations worldwide. Our current and past collaborators include:

Industry Partners

  • Adobe Research
  • Microsoft Research Asia
  • Tencent
  • Alibaba Group
  • ByteDance
  • Baidu Research

Academic Institutions

  • Carnegie Mellon University
  • Stanford University
  • MIT CSAIL
  • Tsinghua University
  • Beijing Institute of Technology
  • Chinese Academy of Sciences

Interested in collaboration? Contact us at research@pkuxlab.org to discuss opportunities.

PKUX LAB

Peking University Information Experience Lab - Creating better information experience for the whole journey when users need information for their usage of products.
